TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAuthorizationDecisionClaimResource extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 安全性權杖的宣告，這個宣告可判斷提示有關存取特定資源的授權決策。

span.span: Represents a claim for a security token that asserts an authorization decision regarding access to a specific resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全性權杖會使用 SAML 判斷提示 (Assertion) 指定其宣告。 security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions. SAML 判斷提示中的宣告會以 SAML 陳述式表示。The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements. SAML 規格會定義一組 SAML 陳述式型別，而其中一個為 。The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a . 會判斷提示 SAML 授權單位對存取特定資源的授權決策。A asserts an authorization decision by a SAML authority regarding access to a specific resource. 類別表示 的宣告資源。The class represents a claim resource for the .

param.name: resource
param.span: 主體要向其請求存取權的資源。

span.span: The resource the subject is seeking access to.

param.name: actionNamespace
param.span: XML 命名空間，其中定義了會用來指定動作的 action 參數。

span.span: The XML namespace in which the action specified in the action parameter is defined.

param.span: 主體已請求在 resource 參數中所指定資源上執行的動作。

span.span: The action sought by the subject on the resource specified in the resource parameter.

summary.span: 使用主體要請求存取權的已指定資源、關於該資源的授權決策、已請求在資源上進行的動作，以及該動作已定義其中的 XML 命名空間，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified resource the subject is seeking access to, the authorization decision regarding the resource, the action sought on the resource, and the XML namespace in which the action is defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性 (Property) 會對應到已在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) 規格中定義之 `Decision` 項目的 `` 屬性 (Attribute)。The property corresponds to the `Decision` attribute of the `` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
